revised_title: The Glucoside Constitution of Proteid Matter: A New Approach to Extracting and Analyzing Sugar from Proteins
tldr: The author investigates the glucoside constitution of proteid matter and develops a new method for extracting and analyzing sugar from proteins. This method involves using potash to separate glycogen and other proteid matters, leading to the discovery of a new CuO reducing product derived from a cleavage of the proteid molecule.
